bug.author: reyoung
bug.summary: TravisCI new Ubuntu Trusty 14.04 image cause Paddle building error.
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/pull/2561>#2561</denchmark-link> gives a temporary fix. But we should use new Ubuntu Trusty 14.04 image, and update our TravisCI script asap.
